name: 2023 The 13th International Conference on Education, Research and Innovation
content: Publicationï¼š All papers submitted to the ICERI2023, will be published in one of those two journals below: Option A: International Journal of Information and Education Technology (IJIET) ISSN: 2010-3689 DOI: 10.18178/IJIET Indexing: Scopus (Since 2019), EI(INSPEC, IET), Electronic Journals Library, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc. Paper Template: http://www.ijiet.org/files/IJIET\_template.doc Option B: International Journal of Innovation, Management and Technology (IJIMT) ISSN: 2010-0248 DOI: 10.18178/IJIMT Indexing: Google Scholar, Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Engineering & Technology Digital Library, Crossref and ProQuest, Electronic Journals Library. Paper Template: http://www.ijimt.org/IJIMT\_template.doc
